Posts.Content: Glittertits wrote: I had my first round of THCP (taxotere, Herceptin, perjeta and carboplatin) yesterday and aside from terrible fatigue and feeling like I have an epic hangover, I’m feeling ok-ish. But I’ve also heard that SE’s can be delayed with this combo. Anyone have any insight on when I could expect what? Thank you! 1/7/19 to 1/30/19 No primary tumor found. Biopsy, MRI biopsy, PET, port, so far just 2-3 L lymph nodes. Starting chemo 2/5/19-Herceptin, perjeta, Doxetaxol, carboplatun. Also DX RA, ILD, bipolar 2, anxiety. Log in to post a reply
